data.text: @LD_Sceptics That cartoon is literally opposite to what's actually happening. The Russians are trying to evac residents from cities, but when the agreed time arrives, Ukrainian forces are shooting at and shelling the people fleeing.
@LD_Sceptics @toadmeister I suspect that the unvaccinated are younger and fitter and that vulnerable people who are vaccinated are dying with illnesses other than Covid.
